description:
This package provides cloned boot option (from current boot option) but only without hyper-v.

    To verify the boot options write open `msconfig` (in windows run, keys WIN+RUN).

    In `Boot` tab section you will see the [updated] list of boot options, e.g:
    * Windows 10 (C:\WINDOWS)
    * Disable Hyper-V (C:\WINDOWS): Current OS; Default OS
author: n3rd4i
